title: Trump Support Sliding? Bezos And Elon FIGHT!!! 4.27.21
itunes:title: Trump Support Sliding? Bezos And Elon FIGHT!!! 4.27.21
description:
In episode 897, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Mall Talk podcast co-host Paige Weldon to discuss Trump support slipping among Republicans, Tucker Carlson's classically reaching, Marco Rubio's thoughts on corporations, the future of working from home, Jeff Bezo's versus Elon Musk, how home releases are helping theaters, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump support slips among Republicans in new poll
  2. Tucker Carlson on wearing masks outdoors
  3. Corporations that undermine American values don’t deserve GOP support
  4. Most Americans Would Take a Pay Cut to Keep Working From Home
  5. Tensions rise as return-to-work plans gain steam
  6. FlexJobs Survey Finds Employees Want Remote Work Post-Pandemic
  7. Jeff Bezos challenges NASA moon-contract award to Elon Musk’s SpaceX
  8. How Warner Bros.’ Hybrid Releases Are Helping, Rather Than Hurting, Movie Theaters
  9. LISTEN: Spider Hole - Billy Woods 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
